main event: Several witnesses observed multiple unidentified flying objects in Sault Ste. Marie, Michigan over a series of dates in December 1960.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing bright lights in the sky, including formations of lights followed by lower and faster objects., Captain Dewan and his co-pilot observed a bright white light while enroute to the airport and stated it was hovering., The local radar did not detect any military or civilian aircraft during the sightings., A businessman reported seeing several white objects moving slowly across the night sky., Multiple reports of similar sightings came from reliable observers over several months.
sighted object: large bright lights and several white objects in the sky
witness description: a Captain and co-pilot, a businessman, and other local citizens
